name: SpeechRecognitionResult
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
V1
SpeechRecognitionResult
description: A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

returns.description: Output-only May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in +max_alternatives+). These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.
